item.title: 对冲基金为特朗普关税做好准备，3 月出现历史性大跌
item.description: 至少有一类投资者已经为唐纳德-特朗普总统周三宣布的关税做好了准备：对冲基金，它们以创纪录的速度抛售股票。【原文：At least one group of investors was ready for President Donald Trump’s Wednesday tariff announcement: hedge funds, which offloaded equities at a record pace.】

item.title: 黄金运往美国的热潮因关税豁免而戛然而止
item.description: 随着周三唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布贵金属将免于征收全面关税，将价值数百亿美元的黄金和白银引向美国的大规模套利贸易戛然而止。【原文：A massive arbitrage trade that has drawn tens of billions of dollars’ worth of gold and silver to the US came to an abrupt halt with Wednesday’s announcement that precious metals would be exempt from Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: 瑞士央行行长楚丁表示，特朗普对瑞士征收的关税高于预期
item.description: 瑞士国家银行理事会成员佩特拉-楚丁（Petra Tschudin）表示，美国决定对瑞士征收 31% 的关税，使瑞士的征税额高于预期。【原文：The US’s decision to slap Switzerland with a 31% tariff leaves the country with a higher levy than anticipated, according the Swiss National Bank Governing Board member Petra Tschudin.】

item.title: 挪威房价增速为去年七月以来最慢
item.description: 随着消费者变得更加谨慎，以及货币宽松政策不断推迟，挪威调整后的房价增长速度为八个月来最慢。【原文：Norway’s adjusted home prices grew at the slowest pace in eight months as consumers turn more cautious and after monetary easing keeps getting postponed.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁需求和经济，大宗商品受到冲击
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税攻势加剧了贸易战，有可能损害全球经济和原材料需求，从石油、工业金属到谷物等大宗商品均出现下滑。黄金在创下历史新高后企稳。【原文：Commodities from oil to industrial metals to grains slipped as President Donald Trump’s tariff onslaught ratcheted up a trade war that threatens to hurt the global economy and demand for raw materials. Gold steadied after hitting a fresh record high.】

item.title: 特朗普针对非洲王国征收全球最高关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对南部非洲山区小国莱索托征收 50%的互惠关税，是对任何主权国家征收的最高关税。【原文：US President Donald Trump imposed a 50% reciprocal tariff on the tiny southern African mountain kingdom of Lesotho, the highest levy for any sovereign nation.】

item.title: 关税扰乱扎根亚洲的比特币矿业供应链
item.description: 劳伦-林（Lauren Lin）很着急。在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对东南亚国家征收关税之前，她只有不到 48 小时的时间将大约 5600 台比特币挖矿机从泰国运往美国。【原文：Lauren Lin is in a hurry. She has less than 48 hours to ship about 5,600 Bitcoin mining machines from Thailand to the US before tariffs imposed on the Southeast Asian country by President Donald Trump kick in.】

item.title: 中国股民涌入香港淘便宜货
item.description: 中国投资者周四在香港抢购了价值近290亿港元（约合37亿美元）的股票，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国征收巨额关税后买入。【原文：Chinese investors snapped up nearly HK$29 billion ($3.7 billion) worth of stocks in Hong Kong on Thursday, buying the dip after President Donald Trump hit China with steep tariffs.】

item.title: 三星、耐克成为特朗普针对中国的附带损害+1
item.description: 全球企业一直在悄悄转移生产，以避免唐纳德-特朗普总统在贸易战 1.0 期间对中国征收关税。现在，总统的 "解放日 "征税正在颠覆这一战略。【原文：Companies globally have been quietly shifting production to avoid the tariffs President Donald Trump slapped on China during Trade War 1.0. Now, the president’s “Liberation Day” levies are skewering that strategy.】

item.description:
下一代金融危机斗士。【原文：

The next generation of financial crisis-fighters.

item.title: 奇货可居：盖特纳谈如何应对金融危机（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：盖特纳谈如何应对金融危机（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Geithner on How to Fight Financial Crises (Podcast)】

item.title: 特朗普关税是世界最贫穷国家的 "灾难
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的新互惠关税将对世界上一些最贫穷的国家造成最严重的打击，使这些国家的劳动密集型出口产业面临风险，并削弱美国相对于竞争对手中国的最大经济优势之一。【原文：President Donald Trump’s new reciprocal tariffs are set to hit some of world’s poorest nations the hardest, putting their labor-intensive export industries at risk and diminishing one of the US’s biggest economic advantages over rival China.】

item.title: 关键供应商被征收关税，美国咖啡饮用者将面临更贵的咖啡
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的全面关税措施对其最大供应商之一的越南征收巨额关税，美国的咖啡有可能变得更加昂贵。【原文：Coffee in the US risks getting even more expensive as President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariff measures hit Vietnam, one of its biggest suppliers, with hefty levies.】

item.title: 丹麦股指因关税和诺和诺德的影响将步入熊市
item.description: 由于关税相关风险和诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）业绩下滑的影响，丹麦基准股指从 9 月份的高点下跌了 21%，成为首个进入熊市的欧洲主要股指。【原文：Denmark’s benchmark stock index has fallen 21% from its September high, making it the first major European index set to enter a bear market, as tariff-related risks and a slump for Novo Nordisk A/S weigh.】

item.title: 与村上有关联的激进投资者增持富士媒体股份
item.description: 与日本最著名的激进分子村上义明有联系的投资者购买了富士媒体控股公司 5.2% 的股份，这给该公司进一步整顿管理层增加了压力。【原文：Investors with ties to Yoshiaki Murakami, Japan’s most well-known activist, bought a 5.2% stake in Fuji Media Holdings Inc., adding pressure on the company to further overhaul its management.】

item.title: 印度顶级石油勘探公司向印度银行申请 2 亿美元贷款
item.description: 印度最大的原油和天然气公司石油天然气公司（Oil and Natural Gas Corp）首席执行官兼董事总经理拉吉内什-卡纳塔克（Rajneesh Karnatak）在回答彭博社的询问时表示，该公司已从印度银行获得 2 亿美元贷款。【原文：Oil and Natural Gas Corp., the largest crude oil and gas company in India, has secured a $200 million loan from Bank of India, said Rajneesh Karnatak, the bank’s chief executive and managing director, responding to a Bloomberg query.】

item.title: 瑞银财富和邓普顿认为中国股市将面临关税打击
item.description: 一些全球最大的基金经理表示，中国股市有能力抵御美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国经济发动的关税闪电战。【原文：Some of the world’s biggest money managers say Chinese stocks have the means to weather the tariff blitz unleashed by US President Donald Trump on the economy.】

item.title: 欧洲央行斯托纳拉斯称美国关税不妨碍四月降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）告诉彭博新闻社，美国政府宣布的关税预计将 "对欧元区第一年的国内生产总值增长率产生负面影响，初步估计约为 0.3% 至 0.4%"。【原文：The tariffs announced by the US administration are expected to “negatively influence the euro-area’s GDP growth rate with a first estimate of the order of 0.3% to 0.4% in the first year,” European Central Bank Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras tells Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 石油贸易商因特朗普征税而避开中国制造的船只，转而选择美国船只
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普为振兴美国造船业而提议对中国制造的船只征收高额费用后，希望预订停靠美国港口船只的石油贸易商正试图避开中国制造的船只。【原文：Oil traders looking to book ships that call at US ports are trying to avoid Chinese-built vessels, after President Donald Trump proposed hefty fees on them in a bid to revive American shipbuilding.】

item.title: 特朗普的互惠关税对印度意味着什么？
item.description: "关税之王"关税的 "滥用大户"。一个 "非常高关税的国家"。美国总统唐纳德-特朗普多年来多次明确表示他对印度贸易保护主义政策的看法。【原文：“Tariff king.” A “big abuser” of tariffs. A “very high tariff nation.” US President Donald Trump has repeatedly made it clear over the years what he thinks of India’s protectionist trade policies.】

item.title: 土耳其 3 月年通胀率降至 38.1%
item.description: 土耳其 3 月份的年度通胀率放缓幅度超过预期，尽管该数据未计入近期因一名主要反对派政治家被拘留而引发的政治和市场动荡所造成的任何影响。【原文：Turkey’s annual inflation slowed more than expected in March, though the data excludes any impact from recent political and market turmoil stemming from the detention of a leading opposition politician.】

item.title: 白宫附件显示部分国家关税水平略有变化
item.description: 十多个将被美国征收互惠关税的国家可能会面临比最初预期略高的征税。【原文：More than a dozen countries set for US reciprocal tariffs may face slightly higher levies than they first expected.】

item.title: 葡萄牙总理联盟在民意调查中领先，RTP 报道
item.description: 据 RTP 网站报道，葡萄牙总理路易斯-黑山领导的葡萄牙民主联盟在民意调查中以 2 个百分点的优势领先于反对党社会党。【原文：Portuguese Prime Minister Luis Montenegro’s AD coalition led the opposition Socialists by a margin of 2 percentage points in an opinion poll, RTP reported on its website.】

item.title: 纳格尔称美国关税将考验欧洲央行的政策进展
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的一系列关税措施威胁着全球经济，也让人质疑欧洲中央银行在对抗通胀方面所取得的成就。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s array of tariffs threatens the global economy and calls into question the European Central Bank’s achievements in fighting inflation, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 南非称美国关税证实双边贸易协议的必要性
item.description: 南非总统府表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统宣布的贸易关税措施表明，与美国谈判一项新的双边互利贸易协定迫在眉睫。【原文：Trade tariffs announced by President Donald Trump affirm the urgency to negotiate a new bilateral and mutually beneficial trade agreement with the US, South Africa’s Presidency said.】

item.title: 亚洲货币和股市在关税影响下领跌新兴市场国家
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的对等贸易关税对该地区造成了巨大影响，亚洲货币和股票领跌新兴市场。【原文：Asian currencies and stocks led emerging-market declines as President Donald Trump’s reciprocal trade tariffs disproportionately impact the region.】

item.title: 瑞士 3 月通胀率意外维持在四年低位
item.description: 瑞士通胀率出人意料地维持在四年来的最低水平，这表明瑞士通胀压力疲软，导致瑞士央行上个月将利率下调至接近零的水平。【原文：Swiss inflation unexpectedly held at a four-year low, evidence for weak pressures that led the central bank to cut interest rates closer to zero last month.】

item.title: 美国成为特朗普关税的最大市场输家
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对全球贸易体系的撼动对美国资产造成的伤害超过了他刚刚加征额外关税的许多大型经济体的资产。【原文：Donald Trump’s shake-up of the global trading system is hurting US assets more than those in many of the big economies he has just slapped with additional tariffs.】

item.title: 军火亿万富翁的捷克斯洛伐克集团去年利润增长两倍
item.description: 捷克斯洛伐克集团公司（Czechoslovak Group AS）是欧洲最大的防务公司之一，该公司表示，由于加大了对乌克兰和北约国家的装备供应，其去年的利润增长了两倍。【原文：Czechoslovak Group AS, one of the biggest defense companies in Europe, said its profit tripled last year as it ramped up supplies of equipment to Ukraine and NATO countries.】

item.title: 关税冲击市场，印度制药、韩国国防股表现亮眼
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）新开征的关税给亚洲股市带来了一些意想不到的赢家，尽管整个地区的股市都在下跌。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s fresh tariffs brought some unexpected stock winners to the fore in Asia, even as equity markets tumbled across the region.】
